thread.title: Guess Co-Founder to Step Away During Investigation Into Conduct

author: Austen Hufford
title: Guess Co-Founder to Step Away During Investigation Into Conduct
text:
Guess? Inc. said Tuesday that co-founder Paul Marciano will relinquish his day-to-day responsibilities with the company and salary during a continuing investigation into recent allegations of improper conduct.
Guess formed a special committee to oversee an investigation after model and actress Kate Upton, in a series of Jan. 31 social-media posts, accused Mr. Marciano of using his power in the industry to harass women. Entertainment website TheBlast.com last month posted accounts of two women who had accused Mr. Marciano...
